title.value: Machine Learning Data Practices through a Data Curation Lens: An Evaluation Framework
title.justification: The title is directly extracted from the first page of the paper, both in the header and in the ACM reference format.
title.quote: Machine Learning Data Practices through a Data Curation Lens: An Evaluation Framework

extractions.description: This paper examines data practices in machine learning dataset development through the lens of data curation. It presents a framework for evaluating machine learning datasets using data curation concepts and principles and analyzes the evaluation results of 25 ML datasets to explore how data curation can be effectively applied in machine learning.

type.justification: The paper involves empirical research as it includes a mixed-methods analysis of evaluation results for 25 ML datasets.
type.quote: Through a mixed-methods analysis of evaluation results for 25 ML datasets, we study the feasibility of data curation principles to be adopted for machine learning data work in practice.

name.justification: The primary research field is machine learning, as the paper focuses on evaluating machine learning datasets and practices.
name.quote: In this work, we present an application of a data curation lens within dataset development in ML to obtain a practical understanding of data practices.

name.justification: The paper examines machine learning practices through the lens of data curation, making it a significant sub-research field.
name.quote: We evaluate data practices in machine learning as data curation practices.

name.justification: The paper references NeurIPS datasets as part of the study to evaluate machine learning dataset practices.
name.quote: We applied the rubric on sample datasets from NeurIPS, the Conference on Neural Information Processing Systems, a leading global venue for AI/ML research.

referenced_paper_title.value: Announcing the NeurIPS 2021 Datasets and Benchmarks Track
referenced_paper_title.justification: This referenced paper is associated with the use of NeurIPS datasets in the research analysis.
referenced_paper_title.quote: The datasets are listed in Appendix C.2... An example publication: Announcing the NeurIPS 2021 Datasets and Benchmarks Track.

name.justification: The paper mentions the 'Chronicling America' collection as part of their dataset.
name.quote: The sample is taken from the overall population (the 'Chronicling America' scan collection).

referenced_paper_title.value: American Stories: A Large-Scale Structured Text Dataset of Historical U.S. Newspapers
referenced_paper_title.justification: This title is related to the Chronicling America dataset, utilized in the research framework.
referenced_paper_title.quote: The dataset is a sample taken from the Chronicling America scan collection, as mentioned in: American Stories: A Large-Scale Structured Text Dataset of Historical U.S. Newspapers.
